casebody.data:
Eric A. KLEIN, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES. No. 18-6949. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 7, 2019. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until January 28, 2019, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court. Justice SOTOMAYOR and Justice KAGAN took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
